content.raw:
Yes, this was a byproduct of generating some benchmarking cave systems.

More complex models and cave systems will have to be generated, and I
believe Ian is going to be looking into procedural generation.

In this case, the "tiles" are 20m x 20m and aligned to a grid, the openings
(if present) should be 5m x 5m on each side, which prevents the gaps.
content.html:
Yes, this was a byproduct of generating some benchmarking cave systems.

More complex models and cave systems will have to be generated, and I believe Ian is going to be looking into procedural generation.

In this case, the "tiles" are 20m x 20m and aligned to a grid, the openings (if present) should be 5m x 5m on each side, which prevents the gaps.
